attributes.action: Keep all Gyms open if the country goes back into lockdown from January 2021
attributes.additional_details: It is important to maintain people’s physical and mental health during the dark winter months. It has been proven that gyms are one of the most hygienic and Covid safe places for the public. Gyms have been fantastic at applying themselves to maintain social distancing and have done everything required to stay safe to the public. Some people can’t access physical activity outside due to lack of space or environmental conditions (ice, snow, cold weather etc).
attributes.background: Keep all the Gyms open if the Government decide to put the country into a third lockdown. It is important people stay active during the winter months even if the country has to going into a third lockdown.
